text: ;Territorial governors in the 17th century – Territorial governors in the 19th century – Colonial and territorial governors by year This is a list of territorial governors in the 18th century (1701–1800) AD, such as the administrators of colonies, protectorates, or other dependencies. Where applicable, native rulers are also listed. A dependent territory is normally a territory that does not possess full political independence or sovereignty as a sovereign state yet remains politically outside of the controlling state's integral area. The administrators of uninhabited territories are excluded. ==Austria-Hungary== ;Austria-Hungary: Austro-Hungarian colonies ==Belgium== ;Belgium: Belgian colonial empire ==Britain== ;Kingdom of Great
